name: Swords & Darkness
overview: Uncover the secrets of your fate, as you venture into the cursed castle. "SWORDS & DARKNESS" is a game set in a dark mystical fantasy world, cast in a single yet action-packed 2D adventure RPG game. New stylish skills and magic complement the character's attacks, and by equipping items and other weapons, the player stands to enjoy a seamless series of thrilling combat.
